attributes.action: Stop BBC news from dumbing down
attributes.additional_details: The BBC news production has become obsessed with politically correct views. Also in an attempt to broaded its audience it has considerably dumbed down in recent years.   It has too many BBC journalists interviewing other BBC journalists about news and current affairs.   The BBC should slim down its management and staff and become more relevant like other news providers.

rejection.details: One for the BBC to answer - the Government can't interfere with the day-to-day running.
